metadata.name: David smokes weed
metadata.description: At the epic Crypto Dealer's annual party, David got drunk! He decided to smoke some weed while sunbathing, but that Mondrian weed split him into shimmering primary colors. It was a colorful journey, just before his meeting with the Crypto Dealer, the owner of the party, who explained the power of Mondrian joints. Since that meeting, David has never been the same, and now he can be found at every pot party. David is on, baby!
